# Section 1: Identify Response Variables & Examine Distributions

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Load dataset
data <- read.csv("lung_cancer.csv")

# Identify response variables
str(data)  # Check structure of dataset
summary(data)  # Summary statistics

# Examine distributions
response_var <- "X01_cMyc_nuc_mean" 
hist(data[[response_var]], main="Distribution of Response Variable", xlab=response_var, col="lightblue")
```
